response.description: This premium-quality cotton t-shirt is designed for comfort and style. Made from 100% organic cotton, it features a classic fit with short sleeves and a round neck. The fabric is pre-shrunk to maintain its shape after multiple washes. Available in sizes S-XXL, it includes detailed care instructions: machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Product highlights: breathable material, fade-resistant printing, and seamless stitching. Specifications: weight 150g/m², 4.1/5 customer rating for durability. Includes one t-shirt per package. Note: Actual color may vary slightly due to monitor settings.
response.seller_notes: Fast global shipping available. 30-day return policy.
